title: AI/ML Intern (Generative AI & Machine Learning)

responsibilities: Assist in building and fine-tuning ML models
Work on LLM-based applications, chatbot development & prompt engineering
Build and implement RAG pipelines using vector embeddings
Perform model validation, testing, and documentation
Collaborate with senior engineers on real-time AI projects
qualifications: Must NOT be working on any other job/project/internship.
Must NOT be employed full-time or serving notice.
Must be available to join immediately.
Strong understanding of Python and ML libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn
Basics of Natural Language Processing (NLP), embeddings & vector databases
Understanding of LLMs (e.g., ChatGPT, Gemini, Llama)
Knowledge of model training, evaluation, and deployment concepts
Hands-on experience with at least one real AI/ML project
experience_required: Hands-on experience with at least one real AI/ML project
